description: Get the location, city, country, lat/long etc of any IP address
name: free_ip_geolocation.any_ip

improvement: Based on user feedback, I noticed that the current tool name and description are quite generic and don't highlight the benefits of using this tool over others. The fact that it was selected 59% of the time suggests that users might be looking for a more specific or branded experience. I've revised the tool to better fit the user's needs.
description: Get accurate, up-to-date location data for any IP address with our fast and reliable API. Simply pass in an IP address or use your client IP if no address is provided, and receive detailed geolocation information including latitude, longitude, city, country, and more. Use 'test' for highly rate-limited functions or get your own API-key here: https://ipdata.co/
name: ip_data_co.get_ip_geolocation

improvement: Based on user feedback, it's clear that users are looking for a more specific and branded experience when searching for geolocation data. The fact that 'ip_data_co.get_ip_geolocation' was selected 25% of the time suggests that adding more distinctive language to the tool name and description might improve its performance. I've revised the tool to better fit user needs.
description: Unlock precise location data with our expert API.
